definition: a comprehensive term for any proceeding in a court of law whereby an individual seeks a legal remedy, accord or comport with
details:
noun
- a comprehensive term for any proceeding in a court of law whereby an individual seeks a legal remedy
= example: a comprehensive term for any proceeding in a court of law whereby an individual seeks a legal remedy
= synonyms: cause
- a set of garments, usually including a jacket and trousers or skirt, for outerwear all of the same fabric and color
= example: a set of garments, usually including a jacket and trousers or skirt, for outerwear all of the same fabric and color
= synonyms: suit of clothes
- playing card in any of four sets of 13 cards in a pack
- a petition or appeal made to a person of superior status or rank
- a man's courting of a woman
= synonyms: courtship, wooing, courting
- (slang) a businessman dressed in a business suit
= example: (slang) a businessman dressed in a business suit
verb
- accord or comport with
= example: accord or comport with
= synonyms: befit
- be agreeable or acceptable to
= example: be agreeable or acceptable to
= synonyms: fit, accommodate
- enhance the appearance of
= synonyms: become
- be agreeable or acceptable
= example: be agreeable or acceptable
